name: Adrian Erlandsson
description:
'''Adrian Paul Erlandsson''' (born 27 October 1970) is a Swedish [[Heavy metal music|heavy metal]] drummer who is a member of [[At the Gates]] (1990–present),  [[The Haunted (Swedish band)|The Haunted]] (1996–1999, 2013–present), and Nemhain (2006–present).

He has also been a member of H.E.A.L. (1994–1996), Hyperhug (1994–1996), Decameron (1997), [[Cradle of Filth]] (1999–2006), Needleye (2006–?), [[Brujeria (band)|Brujeria]] (2006–2013), [[Netherbird]] (2007–2010), and [[Paradise Lost (band)|Paradise Lost]] (2009–2016).

Erlandsson currently resides in London where he owns a photo studio.
